alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 11:58AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central La Plata County through 1230 PM MDT... At 1157 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Mancos, or 13 miles northwest of Durango, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central La Plata County, including the following locations... Mayday, La Plata, Hermosa and Trimble. This includes U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 26 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
